title: Sound On: GOP Pans Biden Revised Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: GOP Pans Biden Revised Infrastructure
description:
Host Jack Fitzpatrick and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discussed President Biden's trimmed-down $1.7 trillion infrastructure proposal and Republican response, the global minimum tax rate, and President Biden's meeting with South Korean President Moon Jae-in.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
